channel.title: [PI] How do you make a bow attack from long range?
channel.description:
Okay, I added a Armadyl crossbow to my server but how can i make it where you can attack from long range with it? When ever I attack someone, I run up to my opponent like if I'm using melee.
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/b70a642fdbcf3b2e37cefcb71160a262.gif[/img]

item.title: [PI] How do you make a bow attack from long range?
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

When I did that, when i attack with crossbow it drops to the floor, why is that?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do you make a bow attack from long range?

item.title: [PI] How do you make a bow attack from long range?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

In Player.java fine:

public final int[] OTHER_RANGE_WEAPONS

and add the id for the armadyl crossbow to that array

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do you make a bow attack from long range?
